keyword: calories in orange chicken panda express
title: Calories in Panda Express Orange Chicken
meta_description: Discover calories in orange chicken panda express per serving, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, sodium, and serving tweaks for better choices.
h1: Calories in Panda Express Orange Chicken
assumptions: Standard single serving (5.7 oz or 162 g) of breaded, fried chicken pieces in sweet orange sauce, as per Panda Express menu.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by portion size, preparation, location, and customizations; check Panda Express app or site for latest values.

quick_answer.text: One serving of Panda Express orange chicken has 490 calories, with 14 g protein and 51 g carbs.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with restaurant info.

tweaks.label: Request sauce on the side (use half)
Add steamed veggies (1/2 cup) as side
Opt for grilled chicken version if available

faqs.q: How many calories in one serving of orange chicken panda express?
What's the protein in panda express orange chicken?
How much sodium is in orange chicken from panda express?
faqs.a: 820 mg sodium per serving, mostly from the sauce.

faqs.q: Are carbs high in panda express orange chicken?
faqs.a: Yes, 51 g total carbs per serving, including 19 g sugars from the glaze.

faqs.q: Can I make orange chicken panda express lower calorie?
faqs.a: Yes, use less sauce or choose grilled over fried to cut 100-150 kcal.
